These numbers may be arranged in any order.
If you dont like these stats you may do 27-point buy with this calculator: http://1-dot-encounter-planner.appspot.com/point-buy-calculator.html

attribs.name: allies_and_organizations
attribs.current:
COMMONER CLASS

Wrote out an IOU to the stalkers den for 25 gold, I have 48 hours to pay them back
mayor who buys drugs hired us to fight bandits and collect stolen gold - didnt know there were 2 dragons, one of the dragons is still alive. I intimidated the mayor into paying my IOU to his dealers. We might be re-hired to go back and fight the remaining dragon.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LCFwiyrpWsdu7S2qcD3_itemmodifiers
attribs.current: Item Type: Melee Weapon, Damage: 1d4, Damage Type: Piercing, Range: 20/60

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LCH3VuIzBO194OEjveX_description
attribs.current: Your knowledge of how bureaucracies function lets you gain access to the records and inner workings of any noble court or government you encounter. You know who the movers and shakers are, whom to go to for the favors you seek, and what the current intrigues of interest in the group are.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LCHCUhNKvdSicR53ZHo_itemcontent
attribs.current: Ammunition: You can use a weapon that has the ammunition property to make a ranged attack only if you have ammunition to fire from the weapon. Each time you attack with the weapon, you expend one piece of ammunition. Drawing the ammunition from a quiver, case, or other container is part of the attack. At the end of the battle, you can recover half your expended ammunition by taking a minute to search the battlefield.

attribs.current:
Start as level 2 fighter with bonus feat for surviving 5 levels as commoner:
Feat:
Resilient (WIS):
+1 wis and prof in WIS saves.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LFxtyrXZKJ4sx7Cs-eR_itemcontent
attribs.current: A shield is made from wood or metal and is carried in one hand. Wielding a shield increases your Armor Class by 2. You can benefit from only one shield at a time.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LFxuPZ98buZKlFOebLW_itemcontent
attribs.current: Made of interlocking metal rings, chain mail includes a layer of quilted fabric worn underneath the mail to prevent chafing and to cushion the impact of blows. The suit includes gauntlets.

attribs.name: additional_feature_and_traits
attribs.current:
Faction: Eternal Archivist
Level 1: +1 INT, capped at 20.
Level 5: Ability: Potent Cantrip
When you cast a cantirip that makes an attack roll, You may choose to(as a bonus action) declare the cantrip as potent before you roll to attack. If your attack hits, Roll an extra damage die as if the cantrip were cast at a higher level. At level 15 this ability no longer requires the use of a bonus action.

Level 10: Resilient Feat
This feat must be the resilient feat in any chosen stat with which you do not have saving throw proficiency already.

Level 15: +2 to spell attack rolls
Level 20: +3 focus of your choice

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LFyJ3Stx0IJ6ir0-Idz_description
attribs.current:
Cantrips: 2
Spells: 3
Slots: 2x 1st level

Weapon Bond:
Learn a ritual that creates a magical bond between yourself and one weapon. Ritual takes 1 hour, which can be done during a short rest. Once bonded you can't be disarmed unless incapacitated. I can summon it to my hand as a BA. Can have 2 bonded weapons, but can only summon one at a time with a BA.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-cantrip_-LFyKHIDgallf05yzM0m_spelldescription
attribs.current: You hurl a mote of fire at a creature or object within range. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes 1d10 fire damage. A flammable object hit by this spell ignites if it isnt being worn or carried.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-cantrip_-LFyLHv7TEkti36aq7rr_spelldescription
attribs.current: As part of the action used to cast this spell, you must make a melee attack with a weapon against one creature within the spell's range, otherwise the spell fails. On a hit, the target suffers the attack's normal effects, and it becomes sheathed in booming energy until the start of your next turn. If the target willingly moves before then, it immediately takes 1d8 thunder damage, and the spell ends.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-cantrip_-LFyLHv7TEkti36aq7rr_spellathigherlevels
attribs.current: This spell's damage increases when you reach higher levels. At 5th level, the melee attack deals an extra 1d8 thunder damage to the target, and the damage the target takes for moving increases to 2d8. Both damage rolls increase by 1d8 at 11th level and 17th level.

attribs.name: repeating_attack_-LFyLX6-Nhpf8R39td7x_atk_desc
attribs.current: Second Damage only if they move before the start of my next turn

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-LFyM1OqL5ZdIcL0t8dN_spelldescription
attribs.current: The spell captures some of the incoming energy, lessening its effect on you and storing it for your next melee attack. You have resistance to the triggering damage type until the start of your next turn. Also, the first time you hit with a melee attack on your next turn, the target takes an extra 1d6 damage of the triggering type, and the spell ends.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-LFyM1OqL5ZdIcL0t8dN_spellathigherlevels
attribs.current: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the extra damage increases by 1d6 for each slot level above 1st.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-LFyMC29w3XACOIOGkAu_spelldescription
attribs.current: An invisible barrier of magical force appears and protects you. Until the start of your next turn, you have a +5 bonus to AC, including against the triggering attack, and you take no damage from magic missile.

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-LFyMC29w3XACOIOGkAu_spellcastingtime
attribs.current: Reaction, when hit by an attack/magic missile

attribs.name: repeating_spell-1_-LFyMLeBOuM0ABxK1Y9J_spelldescription
attribs.current: This spell allows you to move at an incredible pace. When you cast this spell, and then as a bonus action on each of your turns until the spell ends, you can take the Dash action.
